text:
I’ll chime in here..

I think if you were going to add in a default for anything that using |default() seems like the way to go, even if I wouldn’t uses it like that

Hi guys,

How can I use the operators in the crm_associations query string?
For example I would like to filter the contacts records that contain “lou” in the first name, in this case the search results reponse with “LOUran” or “LOUren” or “LOUrence” or etc.

Is it possible only with crm_associations query string?
